a:alert-plugin.name: alert-snmp
a:alert-plugin.description: Alert sender plugin that sends alert notifications via SNMP traps
a:alert-plugin.serverplugin:help: Used to send notifications to SNMP trap receivers.

c:simple-property.name: genericId
c:simple-property.description: Set the generic trap type. Default is 6 (=Enterprise specific).

c:simple-property.name: enterpriseOid
c:simple-property.description: OID of the sender, identifies the type of managed object generating the trap. Default is enterprise.jboss.rhq.rhqServer

c:simple-property.name: specificId
c:simple-property.description: Enterprise-specific ID of the trap. If this is set, the generic ID must be set to 6.

c:simple-property.name: agentAddress
c:simple-property.description: Address of our SNMP agent (=the RHQ server)

c:simple-property.name: authProtocol
c:simple-property.description: Authorization protocol to use. If no Auth Passphrase is given, this must be set to 'none'.

c:simple-property.name: privacyProtocol
c:simple-property.description: The privacy protocol to use in conjunction when the auth protocol is set

c:simple-property.name: authPassphrase
c:simple-property.description: Auto Passphrase is required with authorization enabled. If this is not set, authProtocol must be not set as well. Length must be > 8.

c:simple-property.name: privacyPassphrase
c:simple-property.description: Privacy Passphrase is required with privacy enabled

c:simple-property.name: host
c:simple-property.description: Trap target host. Required if not yet set in the sender-wide preferences

c:simple-property.name: oid
c:simple-property.c:description:
RHQ will send alert notification details as a list of variable bindings in the SNMP trap PDU. This OID is the common prefix of those bindings.

Do not confuse this paramater with 'Trap Oid'.

c:simple-property.name: trapOid
c:simple-property.c:description:
If set, the value of this paramater will override the value of the Trap Oid parameter defined globally in the server plugin configuration. The Trap OID is sent as the second variable binding in the SNMP trap PDU.

Only applicable to v2c and v3 traps.

Do not confuse this paramater with 'Variable bindings prefix'.
